author: Ingrid Miley
title: Keelings confirms foreign workers are sharing bedrooms
description: Fruit distribution company Keelings has again defended its compliance with HSE guidelines on the Covid-19 virus but confirmed that workers flown in from Bulgaria are sharing bedrooms.
content:
Fruit distribution company Keelings has again defended its compliance with HSE guidelines on the Covid-19 virus but confirmed that workers flown in from Bulgaria are sharing bedrooms.
In a statement to RTE this evening, Keelings stated the workers are curren… [+3442 chars]
